text: new violence in Iraq a possible and for
spider-man and sports uniforms multiply
good afternoon this is the New York
Times minute seven bombs detonated
across Baghdad today these latest
apparently coordinated attacks killed 37
and injured more than 80 the violence
has spiked since the American withdrawal
in 2011 spider-man the blockbuster
Broadway show with a troubled start
announced its closing it costs over a
million dollars every week to produce
and ticket sales weren't keeping pace
but superheroes never really die the
producers want to move the show to Vegas
and in sports it used to be simple one
uniform for home and one for the road
but now teams like the Miami Heat have
many more options they went to boost
merchandise sales of course but also
stand out it can have the opposite
effect a month into the NBA season
sometimes it can be hard to tell the
teams apart
